PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign an AGREEMENT for the PROMOTION and PROTECTION OF INVESTMENTS between Canada and the Republic of COSTA RICA, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing one of several Canadian officials to sign the Agreement for Canada.
